-- Hoogle documentation, generated by Haddock
-- See Hoogle, http://www.haskell.org/hoogle/


-- | Mutable memory locations with callbacks
--   
@package keera-callbacks
@version 0.1

module Data.CBMVar
data CBMVar a
newCBMVar :: a -> IO (CBMVar a)
readCBMVar :: CBMVar a -> IO a
writeCBMVar :: CBMVar a -> a -> IO ()
modifyCBMVar :: CBMVar a -> (a -> IO a) -> IO ()
installCallbackCBMVar :: CBMVar a -> IO () -> IO ()

module Data.CBRef
data CBRef a
newCBRef :: a -> IO (CBRef a)
readCBRef :: CBRef a -> IO a
writeCBRef :: CBRef a -> a -> IO ()
modifyCBRef :: CBRef a -> (a -> a) -> IO ()
atomicModifyCBRef :: CBRef a -> (a -> (a, b)) -> IO b
installCallbackCBRef :: CBRef a -> IO () -> IO ()
